TextLibrary.Text: Tauron
Farewell, young Firewalker. It is time you moved on. Your destiny awaits.
Farewell, young Firewalker. It is time you moved on. Your destiny awaits.
Farewell, young Firewalker. It is time you moved on. Your destiny awaits.
Farewell, young Firewalker. It is time you moved on. Your destiny awaits.
Thank you, Tauron. I'll tell my people about this land and about the Firewalkers. We've judged Minotaurs quite harshly in the past.
Thank you, Tauron. I'll tell my people about this land and about the Firewalkers. We've judged Minotaurs quite harshly in the past.
Thank you, Tauron. I'll tell my people about this land and about the Firewalkers. We've judged Minotaurs quite harshly in the past.
Thank you, Tauron. I'll tell my people about this land and about the Firewalkers. We've judged Minotaurs quite harshly in the past.
We are a varied race, just as the Humans are. All Minotaurs are not slavers, nor are we all Firewalkers. The truth lies somewhere in between, as truth often does.
We are a varied race, just as the Humans are. All Minotaurs are not slavers, nor are we all Firewalkers. The truth lies somewhere in between, as truth often does.
We are a varied race, just as the Humans are. All Minotaurs are not slavers, nor are we all Firewalkers. The truth lies somewhere in between, as truth often does.
We are a varied race, just as the Humans are. All Minotaurs are not slavers, nor are we all Firewalkers. The truth lies somewhere in between, as truth often does.
I have one more request. It is clear to me now that Lord Bane is behind this entire scheme. Can you show me the way to his Citadel in the Realms of Death?
I have one more request. It is clear to me now that Lord Bane is behind this entire scheme. Can you show me the way to his Citadel in the Realms of Death?
I have one more request. It is clear to me now that Lord Bane is behind this entire scheme. Can you show me the way to his Citadel in the Realms of Death?
I have one more request. It is clear to me now that Lord Bane is behind this entire scheme. Can you show me the way to his Citadel in the Realms of Death?
Indeed. I have marked it upon your map already. Take care, young Firewalker. The Realms of Death are a dangerous place.
Indeed. I have marked it upon your map already. Take care, young Firewalker. The Realms of Death are a dangerous place.
